name: clovermon-showdown-assets
description: This is a central repository for sprites and audio related to [Clovermon Showdown](https://github.com/MrSableye/clovermon-showdown) and the [Clovermon Showdown Client](https://github.com/MrSableye/clovermon-showdown-client).

scripts.verify-all-no-warn: npm run build && node dist/verify --directory clover --directory clover-cap --directory sburbmons --directory wipmons --directory sweet --directory create-a-blobbos --showWarnings false
scripts.verify-all: npm run build && node dist/verify --directory clover --directory clover-cap --directory sburbmons --directory wipmons --directory sweet --directory create-a-blobbos
scripts.verify-all-prune: npm run build && node dist/verify --deleteUnexpected --directory clover --directory clover-cap --directory sburbmons --directory wipmons --directory sweet --directory create-a-blobbos
